name: Cloth Collage/Creative Hand Stitching Class...4 weeks...(Studio 201c)
description:
Learn the art of combining cloth shapes and hand-stitching in a relaxed, connected, intuitive style….customized curriculum for each student.  Classes are held in my newly designed studio. This is a process based class. Individual guidance at every level. Use of  Up-cycled cloth is encouraged. A simple sewing kit is all that is needed.  Scissors, embroidery floss, needles and pins….and fabric pieces and scraps.

4 classes  Thurs.   1-4:00.  This is an ongoing class. All levels are welcome.

name: Mixed media/Collage Dec 20   (Ladies Night Out Winter Series)
description:
Fri.   Dec 20th       7-10:00  Bring your own drinks and munchies!

A variety of  painting techniques will be taught  to create a one of a kind painting on a canvas. This is an intuitive process and is a great way to get in touch with your creative muse. 

Using acrylic paint I will demonstrate blending, textures, stencils, stamping and more. 

We will then embellish with markers, pens, glitter and other ephemera. 

Bring anything that you may want to add to your painting...such as pictures, magazine images, words, etc. 

Limited seating...order now to ensure a spot.

name: Treasures Mosaic           Dec 13th    (Ladies Night Out Winter Series)
description:
Fri.    Dec 13th    7-10:00  Bring your own Wine, Drinks, munchies!

Great Gift Idea!

Using special family treasures from your life...buttons, jewelry, broken china, sea glass, gemstones, small rocks and other treasures...you will create a 5x5 tile. This is a great way to use those tiny pieces that you've been collecting. 

I will supply the basics...and give you lots of creative inspiration!

Bring lots of small things to put on your piece.  Better to have too much than not enough. 

Limited Seating...order now to ensure a spot!
